fi.opendemocracy.web
Class AbstractEntityView<E>

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponent
      com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponentContainer
          com.vaadin.ui.CustomComponent
              fi.opendemocracy.web.AbstractEntityView<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.event.MethodEventSource, com.vaadin.terminal.Paintable, com.vaadin.terminal.Sizeable, com.vaadin.terminal.VariableOwner, com.vaadin.ui.Component, com.vaadin.ui.ComponentContainer, TabNavigator.View, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
CategoryView, ExpertView, ODUserView, PropositionOptionView, PropositionView, RepresentationView, VoteView
public abstract class AbstractEntityView<E>
extends com.vaadin.ui.CustomComponent
implements TabNavigator.View

Base class for that defines the common layout and some UI logic for all entity views. This class is not specific to any entity class.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

AbstractEntityView

public AbstractEntityView()
Constructor for an abstract entity view. The methods createTable() and createForm() are used to create the main parts of the view.
